title: Technology and Spirituality - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/5/18
itunes:title: Technology and Spirituality - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/5/18
description:
George Noory and human spirituality expert William Henry debate the advancement in technology and artificial intelligence, and whether that will lead to the loss of human consciousness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
